data.name: PREDATOR AND WRECK 捕食者と崩壊
data.detailed_description:
学生コンテストでユーザー大賞を受賞し、Nintendo Switchにてリリースされた「ステルスSFホラー」がSteamに登場！

進化を続ける未確認生物が徘徊する宇宙ステーション！
足音や呻き声を頼りに未確認生物を回避し脱出せよ！

※Switch版をベースに演出、ゲームバランスなどを強化したバージョンアップ版となります。

This game is currently only available in Japanese.
Translation work is currently underway.

Stealth horror game that won the User Grand Prize in a Japanese student contest and was released on Switch.
An English version for Steam will be released by the end of the year!
Please add this game to your wish list and wait.

A space station roamed by evolving, unidentified creatures!
Use footsteps and grunts to avoid unidentified creatures and escape!

■Story
After receiving a distress call from the space station, the crew went to investigate the explosion and search for survivors.
There, they encounter an unidentified creature that preys on humans.
Can you solve the mystery of the unidentified creature and escape safely?

Stealth Elements
Avoid encounters with unidentified creatures by relying on footsteps and grunts.
Use alarms to attract the attention of unidentified creatures, or use the smoke from a fire extinguisher to block their view.
You can hide yourself in a shelter.

■Game Features
The goal is to escape by solving riddles.
There is no way to fight back.
Four difficulty levels are available; Expert mode is released when Hard mode is cleared.
Browse PCs and investigate the cause of the accident.
Auto-save and manual save are supported.



■Guidelines
Permission is granted to individuals and corporations to post gameplay on social networking sites and video distribution sites for commercial and non-commercial purposes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
